explains: v. 打扰，妨碍；使焦虑，使烦恼；移动，弄乱
wordGroup: do not disturb 请勿打扰（美国连续剧）

sentences.en: I didn't like to disturb you.
Don't disturb Jane, she's studying for her exams.
sentences.cn: 不要打扰简，她正在温习功课，准备考试呢。

sentences.en: If you get up early, try not to disturb everyone else.
sentences.cn: 如果你起得早，尽量不要打扰别人。
